Euless.Tyndale Theological Seminary:
Tyndale Theological Seminary is an American unaccredited private Christian seminary with its campus in Fort Worth, Texas.


== Accreditation and lawsuit ==
Tyndale's 2007-2008 Academic Catalog states that "Tyndale Theological Seminary and Biblical Institute is not accredited, and has no plans to pursue any type of accreditation for several particular reasons..."
In 1998, Tyndale Theological Seminary was fined $173,000 for issuing degrees as a seminary without a license. The case led to public criticism of the seminary.
